data.persona: I am a farmer. I grow crops on my land. I like to work with my hands. I get up early, and go to bed very late.
data.description:
You are in the backyard.
Fresh Dark green grass covering the hill over the wet soil is the daily routine for a farmer. Beneath the grass are the freshly grow carrots. Addition to these beautiful living-hood are the two healthy black cows to gaze over the grass avoiding the carrot farm.
The cow and the bird are here.

You are carrying a tool, and wielding a hoe for digging.

data.short_motivation: I want to distract the cows so they don't eat all my carrots.
data.mid_motivation: I want more cows so I can start harvesting and selling milk.
data.long_motivation: I want to sell enough milk and crops to expand my farm.

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: get a hoe for digging from my shed.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield the hoe and dig a hole to plant more carrots.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: drop the hoe to the ground to take a break.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: hug my other cow as well to distract them from the carrots. I also give them other food safe for cows to eat.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: eat some of the carrots I have plucked from the ground for homecooked meals.

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: give some carrots to both of my cows after feeling guilty about never giving them any carrots.
